column5: I was just reading the article on the record rainbow caught in Saskatchewan.. Man what a pig of a trout...HUGE!! http://sports.espn.go.com/outdoors/fishing...tory?id=2901070
espn has old news  ofncommunity.com beat them by a week  record rainbow trout  but it is a pig
I remember reading the post here. I just missed seeing a picture of the beast. That must of been a blast catching it on 6lb test.
oh yeah wouldn't that be a blast
That thing is grotesque!  But it would have been a helluva fight I bet...  Mike

well i have some real nice photos of the fish from the night it was landed, however at this time ESPN among a whole host of other sponsors have signed up all the rights to all pictures and info, so unfortunately without the right logos on each picture i cant post them as hoped, ah well im sure they will all come out sooner or later
Farm raised fish i would have to say ..
